name: Trash TV
description: Welcome to the world of Trash TV. Cast away into a recycling center, you play an outdated tube television animated to life with a singular goal â€“ find your remote control and become fully functional again.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 Processor: 1GHz and Up Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: At least 32MB of video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 850 MB available space Additional Notes: Best played with controller.
